item.title: Introductory Statistical Functions in Python
item.description: Introduction Throughout SDS 348, I and other students primarily learned how to do a variety of functions using R. However, in the latter portion of the course we were introduced to Python, and learned that the two languages weren't too different from each other. In this blog, I'll take you through some very basic statistical functions that can be performed within Python. Importing and observing datasets The process of doing so in R is quite simple, especially when dealing with datasets already in R.
